Returns: This value will never be null.
getSource().Description: Retrieve the @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#Source_E@ that was interrupted. This can be used for equality checking to find the Source which failed to completely decode.

getError().Description: Retrieve the reason that decoding was interrupted. If the error is @B_android#graphics#ImageDecoder#DecodeException#SOURCE_EXCEPTION_E@, the underlying @B_java#lang#Throwable_E@ can be retrieved with @B_java#lang#Throwable#getCause_E@.
